fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Skyward Atlas, Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers, Oathsworn Eye

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Emblem of Severed Fate <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Energy Recharge +20%.
• Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Noblesse Oblige <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Elemental Burst DMG +20%.
• Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:

Noblesse Oblige <:2x:957694031343812619>*
• Hydro DMG Bonus +15%
• Elemental Burst DMG +20%
